table_caption: Clinical and cognitive predictor variables. Group-averaged values of clinical and cognitive variables from the psychosis-risk calculator that entered into the prediction model. SIPS P1 and P2 scores are shown separately here to allow easy interpretation, but a combined value was used in the prediction analysis by rescaling each score down to a maximum of 3 (using 0 for values of 0–2) and adding the scores together. Statistical comparison was performed using analysis of variance for continuous and chi-squared tests for categorical variables.
